name: Eclipse (TeamGiggles)
description:
5 students working together to create this school project.

This game was conceived and created in 6-7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

In the year 1846, a number of people within a small European town started to disappear. The people were being eaten by monsters that reside in the king’s castle. A desperate town offered what little money they had as a reward for anyone that would be able to save them from the monsters. To the town’s surprise, they were soon flooded with adventurers and bounty hunters from around the globe, unaware of what they were about to get themselves into. You are one of those bounty hunters.

Enter the infested castle with a revolver in one hand and a dagger in the other. Clear out all the monsters that have been terrorizing the town!
